api_description: Retrieve the mass flow rate information of a fluid

fluid_name.description: The name of the fluid for which you want to get the mass flow rate (e.g., water, air, oil)

cross_sectional_area.description: The cross-sectional area through which the fluid is flowing in square meters (e.g., 2.5, 10.6, 15.2)

flow_velocity.description: The velocity of the fluid flow in meters per second (e.g., 0.5, 1.2, 2.8)

mass_flow_rate.description: The mass flow rate of the fluid in kilograms per second

api_description: Calculates the residence time in a chemical reactor

volume.description: The volume of the reactor in liters

flow_rate.description: The flow rate of the reactants in liters per second

conversion.description: The desired conversion of the reactants in percentage

residence_time.description: The residence time in the reactor in seconds

conversion.description: The achieved conversion of the reactants in percentage

api_description: Set the setpoint value for a controller in a chemical process

controller_id.description: The identifier of the controller in the process (e.g., C1, C2, C3)

setpoint.description: The desired value for the setpoint

success.description: Indicates whether the setpoint value was successfully updated

api_description: Adjust the control gain of a controller in a chemical process

controller_id.description: The identifier of the controller in the process (e.g., C1, C2, C3)

gain.description: The value to adjust the control gain

success.description: Indicates whether the control gain was successfully adjusted

api_description: Retrieve the parameters for a fermentation process

microorganism.description: The microorganism used in the fermentation process (e.g., yeast, bacteria)

substrate.description: The substrate or feedstock used in the fermentation process (e.g., glucose, ethanol)

temperature.description: The temperature at which the fermentation process is carried out (in Celsius)

fermentation_time.description: The duration of the fermentation process (in hours)

product_concentration.description: The concentration of the desired product obtained from the fermentation process

api_description: Determine the glass transition temperature of a polymer material

polymer_type.description: The type of polymer (e.g., polyethylene, polypropylene)

molecular_weight.description: The average molecular weight of the polymer (in g/mol)

glass_transition_temperature.description: The glass transition temperature of the polymer material (in Celsius)

api_description: Calculate the energy output of a renewable energy system

system_type.description: The type of renewable energy system (e.g., solar, wind, hydro)

system_capacity.description: The capacity of the renewable energy system in kilowatts

location.description: The location where the system is installed (e.g., city, country)

energy_output.description: The estimated energy output of the renewable energy system in kilowatt-hours per day

api_description: Remove impurities from water using various techniques

water_source.description: The source of water (e.g., tap water, well water)

impurity_type.description: The type of impurity present in the water (e.g., heavy metals, organic compounds)

treatment_method.description: The technique used for removing the impurity

water_quality.description: The quality of water after removing the impurity

api_description: Check the chemical composition of a sample

sample_id.description: The unique identifier for the sample

composition_type.description: Type of chemical composition to check (e.g., elemental composition, percent composition)

testing_method.description: The testing method used to determine the chemical composition

composition.description: The chemical composition of the sample

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the chemical composition

api_description: Retrieve information about drug delivery systems

drug_name.description: The name of the drug (e.g., Aspirin, Insulin)

delivery_device.description: The type of delivery device (e.g., injection, transdermal patch)

patient_type.description: The targeted patient type (e.g., adult, pediatric, geriatric)

delivery_system.description: The drug delivery system for the specified drug

administration_route.description: The administration route of the drug delivery system

patient_compliance.description: The level of patient compliance achieved by the drug delivery system

api_description: Provide troubleshooting guidance for chemical plant issues

issue_description.description: A description of the issue faced in the chemical plant (e.g., abnormal temperature, low pressure, equipment malfunction)

troubleshooting_guide.description: A step-by-step guide to troubleshoot and resolve the plant issue

api_description: Retrieve the source of wood used in paper production

paper_type.description: The type of paper for which you want to retrieve wood source (e.g., newsprint, tissue paper, cardboard)

region.description: The region from which you want to retrieve wood source (e.g., North America, Europe, Asia)

wood_source.description: The source of wood used in the specified paper type at the specified region

api_description: Estimate the durability of a paper based on its composition and processing parameters

fiber_type.description: The type of fiber used in paper production (e.g., hardwood, softwood)

additives.description: Additives used in the paper (e.g., fillers, bonding agents)

processing_conditions.description: Processing conditions used (e.g., temperature, pressure, drying time)

durability.description: The estimated durability of the paper
